segment.source: Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.
segment.target: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.

segment.target: Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business!
segment.target: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business!

segment.source: You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.
segment.target: You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Sign up and get started
segment.target: Sign up and get started

segment.source: IT admins can sign up for the Store for Business, and get started working with apps.
segment.target: IT admins can sign up for the Store for Business, and get started working with apps.

segment.source: Find and acquire apps
segment.target: Find and acquire apps

segment.source: Use the Store for Business to find apps for your organization.
segment.target: Use the Store for Business to find apps for your organization.

segment.source: You can also work with developers to create line-of-business apps that are only available to your organization.
segment.target: You can also work with developers to create line-of-business apps that are only available to your organization.

segment.source: Distribute apps to your employees from the Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Distribute apps to your employees from the Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Distribute apps to your employees from Store for Business.
segment.target: Distribute apps to your employees from Store for Business.

segment.source: You can assign apps to employees, or let employees install them from your private store.
segment.target: You can assign apps to employees, or let employees install them from your private store.

segment.source: Manage apps
segment.target: Manage apps

segment.source: Manage settings and access to apps in Store for Business.
segment.target: Manage settings and access to apps in Store for Business.

segment.source: Device Guard signing portal
segment.target: Device Guard signing portal

segment.source: Device Guard signing is a Device Guard feature that is available in the Store for Business.
segment.target: Device Guard signing is a Device Guard feature that is available in the Store for Business.

segment.source: It gives admins a single place to sign catalog files and code integrity policies.
segment.target: It gives admins a single place to sign catalog files and code integrity policies.

segment.source: After admins have created catalog files for unsigned apps and signed the catalog files, they can add the signers to a code integrity policy.
segment.target: After admins have created catalog files for unsigned apps and signed the catalog files, they can add the signers to a code integrity policy.

segment.source: You can merge the code integrity policy with your existing policy to include your custom signing certificate.
segment.target: You can merge the code integrity policy with your existing policy to include your custom signing certificate.

segment.source: This allows you to trust the catalog files.
segment.target: This allows you to trust the catalog files.

segment.source: Manage settings in the Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Manage settings in the Windows Store for Business

segment.source: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant
segment.target: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant

segment.source: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Troubleshooting topics for Store for Business.
segment.target: Troubleshooting topics for Store for Business.
